title: The Light in Your Eyes
description: This story is no longer available online as it's been published professionally. The first book is Pick Up the Pieces and the rest of the series can be found here.Theo Bascopolis wasn't born a rentboy. This is the story of how he became one, and how he eventually left the business because someone loved him enough to ask him to stop. However, when his lover has to go out of town--again--Theo starts to worry that it's the beginning of the end.
author: Tinnean
